feed.title: MetaFilter Deleted Posts

entry.title: Bitter rivals. Beloved friends. Survivors.
entry.content:
Post 199829 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: Navratilova is still listed as a leader of an anti-trans organisation and should not be given a platform in MetaFilter. -- loup
entry.summary: Post 199829 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: Navratilova is still listed as a leader of an anti-trans organisation and should not be given a platform in MetaFilter. -- loup
